short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The one to rule them all. Extension Master manages and groups all your chrome apps and extension neatly for your leisure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that manages other chrome extensions and groups them into a related lists. The one that rules them all.
